mapper.insert: insert into dayoff values ( seq_dayoff_no.nextval, #{formNo}, #{empId}, #{dayOffYear}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{count}, #{leaveCount}, TO_TIMESTAMP_TZ(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul' )
mapper.select: select d.day_off_year, d.start_date, d.end_date, d.count, d.leave_count, df.type, df.content from dayoff d join dayoffform df on d.form_no = df.no where d.emp_id = #{empId} order by d.no desc

select d.* from( select d.day_off_year, d.start_date, d.end_date, d.count, d.leave_count, df.type, df.content, (select base_day_off from job where job_code = e.job_code) base_day_off from dayoff d join dayoffform df on d.form_no = df.no join emp e on d.emp_id = e.emp_id where d.emp_id = #{empId} order by d.no desc )d where rownum = 1
